reviewText: Lacking something besides 4:3 display, that is old TV viewing, when I expected at least wide screen, I did not like the video level.  Audio was clear.  Clearly an import, it also lacked English subtitles for he hearing impaired like me. At least I have a version of it.  However, when I find something better, I will get rid of it.
summary: I did not like the video level
Title: N/A

reviewText: Although none of the actors were familiar to me, they were superb.  The series concept was well-thought out and the sets and special effects were great.  Often, sci-fi movies/series can be cheesy with sub-standard music and dialogue, but it's easy to get caught up in and remain fascinated by this series.  What's really good is that since there so many different plots going on in the series, the intro to each episode connects what's about to be shown with what has already transpired in that plot line.  Each season continues the same high quality.
Title: N/A

reviewText: one of my favorite sci fi series from gene Roddenberry. loved the the entire series. see it over and over again.
